ygData.authorName: At the corner of Sodom and Gommorah with
ygData.from: At the corner of Sodom and Gommorah without a roadmap <douglas@...
ygData.subject: Re: Clerical/Paladin Only Weapon!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Okay, first comment: what is the deal with some people and their need to complain about everything?  Oh, sure, we have this, but that SUCKS. Second
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Feb 1999, kurt walther wrote:

> Ahh.. but in all you happiness that a such a weapon exists you forgot to
> see thta this weapon truly SUCKS. The ratio is pathetic. Past 20 this
> weapon just doesn't cut it.

Okay, first comment: what is the deal with some people and their need to
complain about everything? "Oh, sure, we have this, but that SUCKS."

Second comment: This is great! The discovery of a Cleric/Paladin only
weapon indicates that there might be OTHER cleric/paladin only weapons!

Third comment: maybe this is a low-level quest, hmmm? The cleric
equivalent of the Kelethin Scout's Blade Quest.

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell of
smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
